bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for dc Traction Power System Field Testing and Acceptance Criteria for System Applications up to 1500 Volts dc Nominal
IEEE Standard for dc Traction Power System Field Testing and Acceptance Criteria for System Applications up to 1500 Volts dc Nominal
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1653.4/D2.0, Jun 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard defines field testing and acceptance criteria for transportation system applications powered by a dc traction power system up to 1500 volts nominal.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
